content.detailedDescription: While visting my family's house a light caught my eye as i was on the phone with my girl friend. the object was moving then started to hover and then drifted  back over. it stared to change colors dip down fly up and all over. at this point knew i was seeing somthing extra ordinary and started shouting for every one to go look outside. once we were outside we witnessed the object change color dip down fly up and all around. it was amazing and flew in such a fluid way ive never seen anything like it. it definitely seemed to have an interest in a certan little area,as it would keep dipping down, that seemed to be a common theme. at one point i ran inside to grab a flash light and then started to shine the light at it in a morris code fashion and right away i took notice and flew towards us almost like a curious bee. at this point my heart was pounding a bit  because i did not know what was going to happen, but this was awesome. after a while it lost interest and went back to bumbling around over its lil area. a while later a family member conviced me to go chase it in a car.....With little luck. so all in all this thing was changing color at some points and at otheres it would be three or four spheres of color. it was hovering, going up, down,dipping,fast,slow it was very amazing to watch fly it just seemed to fly perfectly and flawless. and i deffinetly had the impression it was up to somthing as it mostly stayed in a defined area and would constently decened. the film was shot on a canon powershot a720.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo sighted

content.detailedDescription: Driving north bound on 67th ave toward mirmar at about 8:00pm we were looking at the full moon a bright red then orange orb caught our attention. at first we thought it was a plane but it stopped moving then it got brighter turning into a bright bright white orb still not moving. we pulled over to record and then it seem to spray a light and a tiny cloud appeared in its place. the red orb reappeared in another spot and it happend again.  we watched for another 10 mins it did not move just glowed behind te little cloud. pictures taken not very clear taken with a phone.
content.summary: Glowing orb turned into a tiny cloud

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I set-up cam in stable position on wall looking south after noticing lights and trails in southern sky before sunrise. i took 5 minutes of video showing light trails and objects above horizon. i re-set cam in same location and position shortly after sunrise shooting another 5 minute clip.

i re-set cam in same position approximately 9:30, for contrasting shot of earlier sightings, shooting 3 minutes followed by another 3 minute clip after changing the sharpness of the video on cam's internal adjustments, trying to get a better resolution.

in each of the videos, i see what i  had noticed as lights and shapes rising from the horizon between the buildings, center of frame. lights and objects were visible with the naked eye as well as the camera, moving up, circling, then departing at high speed to the west for the most part; some departing to the east or south.

please find attached .Mov files of incident.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.shape: Chevron,   Circle,   Diamond,   Flash,   Triangle,   Other
content.summary: Pre-dawn video, post-sunrise video, mid-morning video

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were on our way to walmart approximately at 11 p.M. last year on april 6th when we noticed an extremely bright light northwest of us.  we decided to drive across the street to get a closer view and parked. two pictures were taken of the same object about a moment apart.  one photo shows the light, from outside the driver side window although it was way brighter upon seeing, in fact, it was the brightest light in the sky that night by far. the other picture was taken outside the passenger side window of the same object but shows two objects which we did not see. the object was very extraordinary in that it was extremely low and extremely bright. the object remained stationary.  about 5 - 10 minutes after viewing the object from the parking spot, we decided to try to get closer to it. as we went driving, we could no longer see it. when we returned about 10 minutes later to the same location that we were before, it was gone. the second photo was cropped to get a closer view of the two objects.
content.summary: Object(s) extremely bright, photgraphed, stationary.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from my mother's house in the wee hours of the morning on or around april 30, 2013.  i'd just turned down my street and was a few blocks away from my house when what appeared to be a shooting star or fireball just suddenly blazed up in front of me, a few hundred feet ahead;  it went right over the road in front of me, moving from left to right as it appeared to begin to disintegrate over the tops of the trees, after which the trees blocked my view of it.  the trees here are oak and are not particularly tall, so this thing was flying pretty low.  i assumed it must have been a very low flying meteorite or something, but the more i look into that sort of thing, the less that seems plausible.  it happened at exactly 3:59 am by my car's clock, and it stunned me so much that i hit the brakes and stopped in the middle of the road.  i looked around to see if it was possible that someone had shot a flare or something, but nobody in the neighborhood was awake.  i never saw it entirely disintegrate;  it just looked like a shooting star had just shot passed me at close range and went over the trees.  i even braced for an impact as my mind calculated when it might hit.  there is a body of water nearby and it occurred to me that if it had landed, perhaps it landed in there.  i don't know what it was.  i don't believe in aliens, but it was definitely unidentified and it was definitely flying through the air.  i figure it must be debris or something, but nobody can explain it or why it was shooting sideways instead of either going straight up or down.  anyway, i figured i'd add my account to the list of weird sightings.  thanks for the chance.
content.summary: Coming home at 4:00 am i saw what looked like a shooting star flash at tree level in front of my car.

content.detailedDescription:
Was stopped at traffic light on colfax and kippling. looked up to the ne in the horizon to the east of downtown saw hovering cloud. kept staring at it because it looked out place, there was no other clouds in the area. was white, almost transparent cylidrical in shape. after a few seconds of watching it i saw blue flashing lights and then red. only lasted not even a second. it stayed hovering over the horizon,until i turned left onto kipling.
i really wish i would have had my camera, not sure if an ipod would have taken a good picture. it was really cool and creepy at the same time. the guy in the car next to me seemed to see the same thing we both gave each other the pointed finger to the sky.
content.summary: Was on corner of colfax and kippling stopped at a traffic light. looked to the ne past downtown and saw silver cloud cyclinder just hovering. thought was a cloud out of palce until i saw flashing lights . very random lights. was still hovering .

content.detailedDescription:
I know this makes the story sound like a lie but i was drunk and i had smoked a joint but i had and still have not ever suffered an occurence of hellucination.
it was a friends 18th birthday so we camped the night at my other friends farm located in winchelsea about 100kms from melbourne australia.
it has been 11 years but i cannot forget what i and my 5 other friends saw i dont know if its a military project or not but here goes.
it was approx 4am would have been a sunday morning we were sitting around a fire when i noticed what i first thought was a satellite, after about 5 seconds of veiwing said object moving i pointed it out to my friends which at that point stopped moving and began backtracking over its original flight path for another 5 seconds then stopped dead in its tracks, which freaked me out and got me excited also.
said object then proceeded to basically fly in triangular patterns stop go back and repeat. looked at it through a rifle scope it did seem to have a roundish mettalic surface but cannot be too sure as it was mainly the light visible. after about 30 minutes of watching an awesome display of flight manouvers it seemed to have ejected a smaller object which gloewed just as bright as the first object only the smaller object was orbiting the larger object and when the large object would suddenly fly away the smaller object would catch up and continue its orbit.
the object was veiwed for at least an hour and i only lost sight of it when i fell asleep.
reasons i think it was military are because it was as if someone was training in its flight because im gathering if it was ets they would have known we were there i dont know all i know is i know what i saw.
i also had another sighting about a year later, and currently i have a photo of a shpere thats mettalic in shape captured in broad daylight i would love to email it to you because its pretty incredible.
please do get back to me i dont really know who else to ask im from australia mufon and your the only organisation i could think of.The photo im attaching to this was taken on an iphone april 5th 2013 i was on the back of the truck my friends dad was in when he took 2 photos of a sign with his sisters name on it. the photos were taken in rapid succession. please analyse 

thank you for your time

guy caudullo
content.summary: Satelite??

content.detailedDescription: Driving in the car, a passenger looked to the sky and asked the question, "what are those?" when i first noticed the two objects in the sky, i thought them to be two paper lanterns that contain candles (that are sent up in some traditions). another passenger thought them to be visible planets. there were two glowing balls of oragne light hovering in the sky at altitudes lower than surrounding planes in the sky. after remaining stationary for a short period of time, the two took off headed away from the car ate extreme speeds. one disappeared into the cloud cover, while the other flew until it was out of sight. during the sighting we all were in awe, and after we were amazed and in disbelief.
content.summary: Two glowing orange balls of light that hovered for a short period of time and then took off extremely fast, one disappearing into the clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
I was learning about cities on the moon  at 4:08am.  went the clearwater

subdivision power went out. i went to my bedroom window. during this time i

began to observer a light.

in the night sky that was moving but not flashing.  as i continued to 

observer this object. it fade as it on its path.




as i continued to watch the night sky. i went to my back yard to observe 

the stars.  to my delight there was another light in the sky. but smaller.

the time was appoximately 4:51am. it seem to be heading in the same area 
 
or direction as the first one i saw.  it also fade until it was not seen.

then at 6:12am the power was back on.  but, i dont think that had any thing

to do with that.
content.summary: A very bright star like,

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my patio facing south about 11:00 pm the night of may 21st, 2013. i was simply relaxing and looking up at the sky observing as the clouds were moving in from the south soon to cover up the moon and stars. the cloud cover was spotty but getting more solid and quickly moving in to completely cover the open night sky and the moon. where i live the jets frequently pass overhead either coming to or leaving midway or o'hare airports which are about 25 and 40 miles north respectively. it is a familiar sight. this night there were various jets at various altitudes coming from varying directions literally every few minutes. i usually can hear them as or after they pass. i am very familiar with them and how they look. i was sitting just quietly watching the clouds roll in. i then noticed a dark form coming from the west over the trees, it was a winged object and my first fleeting thought was that it was a bird. it crossed the sky from w to e in just a few seconds. it was about 35 to 40 degrees from horizon. and i tried to follow it's progress east. it just struck me as odd. it just felt odd because after i thought about it for a second it didn't seem to flap at all, just glide. i got up and walked a few steps to see it as it went east but as i looked for it and it was just gone as if it flew into the cloud cover. i began to dismiss it as nothing. then i saw a brilliant light for a couple of seconds equal to the luminescence of venus coming right from where the object would have progressed. from my point of view about 35 degrees above horizon and to the southeast of me. it was shining either through or below the approaching cloud cover. the whole sighting from seeing the first dark shape to seeing the brilliant light lasted all of 10 seconds or so. i waited until today (may 24th) to report this because i wanted to look tonight at that point in the sky now that the skies are clear, and there are no bright stars or objects anywhere near that vicinity in the sky. if it were a lone bird gliding by (not flapping) that time of night then to traverse that amount of sky it would have had to be only slightly above treetop level and it would have been a quite large bird. if it were another object much higher in the sky then to traverse that distance in the sky it would have been traveling very fast and been much larger perhaps 100 feet or so. with no point of reference it's hard to determine altitude or size. the object was black and the night cover was very grey. there were at the time interval of the sighting, 2 jets in the observable sky at the time. one at a very high altitude (30,000 feet) going southeast and from my view moving slowly across the sky at about 80 degrees above horizon and still northwest of me. the other traveling south and at a lower altitude maybe 3000 feet or less and straight east of me at about 30 degrees above horizon. both had visible blinking lights and usual flight characteristics for a commercial jet. if the black object i observed was actually large and at high altitude i estimate it was on a course that would have brought it close to the later of the 2 observed jets had it stayed on course. i don't know what it was i'm only giving my best observations of the few seconds it appeared to me.  i don't know what that brilliant light that appeared for a couple of seconds was either. if it were a jet approaching with landing lights i would have seen it and/or heard it as it came out of the cloud cover or approached. i waited and saw and heard nothing of the sort. if it didn't feel odd to me i wouldn't report it.
content.summary: Dark wing shaped object flew straight line then went out of sight followed by bright light

content.detailedDescription: We have seen this object before but tonight observed it at approximately 10:00pm. the object was above the tree line and was pulsating and hovered, but then would change direction n, s, w, e. sometimes it would change direction slowly, other times rapidly. i am not sure what the object was. i tried to take pictures and video but did not due it justice. i observed the object pulsate, change colors (white, blue, red, green), hover and move in different directions for almost 45 minutes. it made random movements directly north of where i was standing, then headed west of where it was in the sky and then began to hover again and move in random patterns. near the end of my observation, it moved back toward the east but not quite to the spot where i first saw it and then began to descend below the tree line and i then lost sight of it. it glowed, pulsated, and changed colors randomly. sometimes it would pulsate quickly, other times it would turn white and get very bright (not pulsate), then would fade and return to a random color pattern.
content.summary: Craft with multicolored lights that hovers, changes direction quickly and has pulsating lights in a random pattern

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was at a friends house sitting on the deck visiting while star gazing when from the west came a star shaped object heading straight east until it went out of sight.I then seen a star shaped object coming from the north heading straight south that crossed the path of the other star that passed to the
east,it then changed direction for a short distance at flashing speed to the
west then back east to it's flight path until out of sight.

a star appeared heading north coming from the south which was in the same flight path of  the south bound star,it then headed straight north over 
the rice lake airport.All objects had to be at least over 50 thousand feet
in the sky.

then to the se i seen a half moon shaped object flash solid white with a
dark shade in it,the distance was hard to estimate but it looked like it
was one half to a mile away,and about 300 feet high in the sky.
content.summary: I seen three moving stars and one half moon projected solid white light with a dark shade in it

content.detailedDescription:
I had stepped out back to put my dog on the chain so he could do his business. i look up and out of no where these orange lights appeared in a triangle formation, with perfect space between each light.  when i seen it i froze, thinking of what all it could be, it couldn't have been an airplane because they don't fly that low, and there isn't an air port around here. if it was a helicopter then i would've been able to hear it and there would have been flashing lights. it hovered there for about 10-20 seconds before moving east in still a perfect shape. so i followed it and about 2 minutes passed before it just vanished in the blink of an eye. 
it was like nothing i have ever seen in my life, i was just frozen and i remember the first thing i thought was "get a camera and get evidence and footage. and just then my back porch light started flickering and went dead, but it was a brand new light that i had just put in about an hour before. my dog was going insane and was barking and yelping like i've never heard before. i waited for it for about another 30 minutes for it to re appear but never did. it was as silent as ever.
content.summary: 3 orange lights in perfect triangle formation

content.detailedDescription: Standing on my back stoop smoking i was daydreaming and looking at the clear blue sky, i was thinking how great it was to have such a clear sky as it has been raining the last few evenings here in colorado. i first noticed a "something" thinking it was just crap in my eye i wiped my eye and stood transfixed as six shapes moved across the sky above my house. i did mental flips trying to explain what i was seeing. not birds as they were, well just wrong and not eye crap as they were doing precision movements and didnt go away. i must say that it was very off-putting. they flew in a altering 5-1, 4-2 military like pattern but the speed at witch they switched it up was insane. i ran to get my camera but when i came back they where gone. further note air traffic has been extreamly odd today. just for consideration. also there was a group of people in the vacant lot next to my house that seemed very startled but didnt say anything, when we made eye contact it would seem they were aware of what i was but we didnt exchange words, i was to frightened to say anything at the time.
content.summary: Squad of flyers in low orbit over denver colorado

content.detailedDescription: At about 1020pm i was lying in bed when i saw glowing oragne-red lights outside my bedroom window. i looked out and saw 2 large glowing red-orange orbs floating outside my house approximately roof level. i have seen these several times before, usually between 930 and 11pm, on and off since november 2012.  the glowing orbs traveled down my street heading toward the river, floating, gradually rising and falling. i called my neighbor on the phone so he could witness it as well. the lights started moving away faster, and getting higher while i was on the phone.  they went out over the deleware river (approximately 2 blocks away) and drifted higher before completely disappearing from sight.  ive considered these objects alot as i have seen them several times. them somewhat resemble the lighted lanterns from "tangled" only much larger, and they do not move like lanters, since they synchronise with each other when there are more than one.  there also seems to be a light tail or multiple tails. sort of like a jellyfish.  the objects no longer freak me out, although they are getting distressingly closer to my house. this was right outside my window. i would really like a logical explanation to them.
content.summary: 2 glowing orbs traveled down my street then up and over the delaware river before disappearing

content.detailedDescription: My father, my cousin, and i were outside a relatives' home and for no apparent reason, i had looked overheard possibly to observe a bird or something that caught my eye.I saw a slow moving boomerang shaped object moving north to south at an estimated speed of 30 to 40 mph soemwhere at 5k to 6k altitude. i would estimate the wing span to be over one hundred feet. it stopped and turned 180 degrees and left back in the direction it came from. it was very large, metallic ( the sun glinted off the surface), and it had no apparent propulsion system. no noise, no lights,no props, no baloons attached. we all saw it but had no idea what it was. i was a teenager at the time and after all these years i am still deeply curious as to what could do that. i am retired air force with over 20 years of aircraft maintenance under my belt. airplanes don't do what i saw that boomerang/wing do. i realize memory can lose its' clarity over time, but this has never left me.
content.summary: Ufo moved slowly, stopped, turned 180 degrees, moved off

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting on our deck and noticed a very bright light to the east that was brighter than any star in the sky, even the north star. we watched for about 10 minutes and the light seemed to be changing colors and moving slightly by the naked eye. i first thought that it was a plane coming in but couldn't see any strobe lights flashing. i went in the house and got my canon t1i digital slr with a 75-300 mm f1.4 to 5.6 lens. the first four pictures i took resting the lens on a garden trellis. when i looked at the pictures on the camera the light changed from green to blue to green to blue. i then went in and got out my tripod and continued to take pictures in 5 to 8 continuous shots eventually taking 87 pictures in total. most of the picture were taken at 1/60 of a second but i did take 4 or 5 time lapse photos of about 3 - 5 second, and this light was moving very strangely. i had to go to bed to get up for work at 6 am on tuesday and the light was still in the sky, in the same approximate position at midnight when i went in. the next day after work i downloaded the pictures to my computer and whatever this light was it changed color and position around a fixed star that can only be seen when the pictures are increased in magnification. i got the chills when i discovered the movement. i am willing to let you view all the photos but don't want to upload any to site yet.
content.summary: Saw very bright light hovering that was changing colors and moving slightly

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was watching my brother play video games when i went to the window to check the backyard . 
2. i was looking over at a building across the street from me.
3. i though it was apart of the buildings roof because of the color and size
4. it was just hovering in mid-air silent it was very still no air-craft can stay in one spot like this object was doing.
5.I called my brother over to look cause he did not believe me, when he came i pointed to him he was in shock so was i. we both were glued to the object we started talking to see what it was, i felt weird in my body like i was being watched i felt cold i analyzed the object i saw a great amount of detail on the object, i seen a cockpit i kept staring at it until i seen a figure in it.
6. once i saw the figure it was grey or white color it had a big head and i could see it eyes they were big my brother seen it too, once i saw it the object just vanished in front of our eyes and i was scared because i could not understand what happened. my brother was sweating and nervous we were so scared we stood away from the yard and did not look out that window for a long time. also after this event my brother seen a dark figure jump onto a roof across the street i seen it as well.
content.summary: Copper color triangle shaped like a arrow point silent

content.detailedDescription: Crp circles in two to three fields in wilson co nc
content.summary: Crop circles

content.detailedDescription: Didn't move what ever it was kinda looked normal of some sort untill we looked back a pic
content.summary: Me and fiance was on vacation in oc n saw this rainbow like thing in sky

content.detailedDescription: There was (6) of us outside just around dusk when we heard this noise like a corn chopper. but in our area who chops corn at night? then the sound was really close and then we saw the ufo in sky coming towards us and then it stopped turned right and paused. i pointed a flashlight at it then it turned left again and proceded to got northeast. there were no lights at all it was just a solid black triange object going slow. we never got pictures because it was dusk and getting dark. wow!!!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Dark black triangle with loud sounds like a corn chopper sound

content.detailedDescription: Bright pulsing light that moved and changed direction and hoovered in the new spot fur 1 to 5 10 minutes the would move again sometimes going up then diagonal then down then up again
content.summary: Bright pulsing light that moved and changed direction and hoovered in the eastern sky approxamently near mt. lassen.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog on a dark street, sunday evening may 19, 2013 near columbus, oh.  a bright orange/yellow object caught my eye, in the sky to the east.  i like watching planes so i kept looking at it.  in next 30 seconds 5more orange/yellow objects appeared, moving in the same direction, east to west, as the first object.  the last 2objects were side by side instead of in a straight line.  they all seemed to be pretty evenly spaced.  i watched as they moved through the sky and i tried very hard to hear anything, something that would tell me that these were planes, but i heard nothing.  they seemed pretty low in the sky as well as the appearance was larger than most planes i see fly overhead.  in another 30 seconds my gaze had followed the six objects west, i looked east again and saw 4more objects, same size, same color, same flight pattern as the first 6, moving across the sky.  i was completely fascinated and then quickly thought, pictures, i need pictures.  i snapped a few high def pictures with my iphone.  i was only able to capture 5 of the first group of 6 and then the final group of 4 and a short video.  after i stopped the video i looked to the first group again and saw the lights ascend, swiftly, and then completely dissappear.  i shifted to the last 4 and watched them more closely and they did the same thing.  while i was taking pictures and especially during the video i became self conscious about any light i was shining on myself and briefly thought, "i should get inside".  i did go inside and have been reluctant to say anything because i'm pretty sure people will think i'm a little crazy but i know what i saw and what i didn't hear.
content.summary: 10 objects flew east to west, then swift vertical ascent until no longer visable.

content.detailedDescription:
I looked out the window past 9pm when i saw this intensely bright white light hovering above (not directly above) an old factory. i thought it was a plane at first but it was too big to be one. 

movement & appearance: it suddenly moved as if confused, like it was bouncing around (like a happy (or crazy wild) bunny) in a small-v pattern! (this was when i lunged at my camera :d) as it "bounced" and turned around in place, i found it had red and blue smaller lights on it as well, although white was the surface color. after about a minute it swooped down lightning quick in a slant direction and started spinning fast while moving around a tilted elliptical path. that's also when it appeared to have shape-shifted. it's kind of hard to describe the new shape. it was like an oval this time with maybe 4 or 5 dark, wide vertical louvres shaped like eyelets that apparently stayed on the same side, from my point of view, while revolving.  it was spinning quickly but it was going around a bit slower. it just went round and round for like 10 or more times. i have no idea how it disappeared as the huge factory beside our house was covering the sight. i also wasn't able to see the full laps because of the obstruction, but im pretty sure of it's path as it reappeared from behind the factory every now and then. does this all make sense?!? haha

the event lasted for about 3-5 minutes. i don't know how far it was from me or how high above the ground it was. unfortunately, i was too stoked to remember where my video cam was and i was afraid i'd miss the thing if i looked for it. i would've wanted to see more tho :) it was quite an experience. but never seeing anything like it before, i'm still skeptical.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: ???Ufo??? over manila 5-22-13

content.detailedDescription:
1- doing yard work in the backyard
2- lights distracted me
3- ufo, government aircraft
4- i never herd anything, it seemed pretty far. looked like it was moving just like a jet would.
5- i felt very excited, and called a friend to see if he could see.
6- it traveled out  of sight
content.summary: At 5:30 pm i was in my backyard and saw lights out of the corner of my eye and looked up in the sky to see a triangular craft with 8 yellow lights.

content.detailedDescription:
Tuesday, may 21, 2013 11:37 p.M.
 i was at home with my two little girls, i opened my front door to smoke, and i seen something moving across the sky with very bright red and white flashing lights. this object was not high enough for a plane, and there was no noise (except crickets),it moved slowly and the trees that it passed did not move at all. there was no ring of lights, or any other lights on the object as far as i could see. then as it approached a wooden area by a neighbors house it just stopped, and hovered right above the trees. a few seconds after it stopped a bright beam of white light appeared, blinding even though i was about a football field distance from it. this spotlight effect lasted for approximately 15-20 seconds, and went off as quickly as it had came on. when the spotlight went off the red and white flashing lights reappeared, and the object remained hovering for a few seconds and then exited right back the way it came, this is when i really got spooked, because i know planes can not go backwards. i tried watching for it to pass through my line of sight but i never seen it leave. this object moved very slow, and no noise what so ever, no humming or roaring of engines, no disturbance of the trees or fields, and it went backwards after displaying a spotlight.
i wanted to share my sighting for others to feel comfortable sharing theirs.
thank you,
content.summary: 11:37 p.M, opened front door to smoke, i saw a few bright red and white lights moving slowly by a neighbors house, just watched it then it stopped,& hovered right above the trees, a bright almost spotlight appeared, 15- 20 seconds, went backwards,vanished

content.detailedDescription: My friends were outside waving for me to go outside and look. i looked towards the dfw  airport direction and saw a cigar shaped object with red & green lights on the ends and a red light in the middle that was flashing. it was swaying back & forth changing direction. it kind of resembled a plane but it swayed oddly. wierd! it slowly drifted towards the south. it was hard to see it at times because of the trees. it was kind of scary i've never seen anything like that before
content.summary: Cigar shaped with red & green lights it was swaying back & forth changing direction &

content.detailedDescription: I am a professional licensed investigator and, in fact, was a former mufon field investigator.  i am a former pilot and also a current amateur astronomer.  on the night of may 20th, 2013 at what i believe was probably between 9:00 and 9:30 p.M. i was viewing the planet saturn through my telescope using a 25mm eyepiece.  the telescope was a celestron nexstar 4se maksutov-cassagrain (4" diameter objective) with a focal length of 1325mm.  therefore the magnification used was 53x.  as i looked at the planet, i observed a yellow disc shaped object move in an angled straight path across my field of view in the eyepiece.  it took about 3 seconds to cross the field of view and therefore was moving too slow to be a meteor.  it left a type of "panning or ghost" trail behind it that may have been due to the light itself crossing the path of the eyepiece.  it did not leave  a chem trial or meteoric type of trail that remained in view after the object passed.  i quickly stepped away from the telescope and looked up to see if i could observe the object visually but i could not.  it is quite possible that this object "may" have been a satellite and that the trailing stream behind it was more an optical illusion as the object passed through the field of view, due to its brightness, as i have already mentioned. the object, in the field of view, was definitely round, was steady in yellow color and did not have any other lights, aircraft lights or blinking lights functioning.  it appeared solid in color.  the trail or panning effect of a trail behind it was also yellow.  in the telescope field of view the disc of the object was smaller than the disc of the planet saturn as it passed.  i would estimate that the disc appeared to be just larger than the size of the tip of a ballpoint pen when viewing it through the telescope.
content.summary: Object too slow to be meteor observed through eyepiece crossing field of view while observing saturn in telescope

content.detailedDescription: I was videoing a fire and watching the fire planes flying around it was the whisky flats fire 7/14/2009 at 3:11pm. i was in old magala up skyway road looking over the valley through a space in the trees and had a great view to see the fire. i did not see it until i was looking at my videos that i took and was deleting video off my phone to make room on my micsd card and that is when i found it on the video. i was so focus on the fire and planes that i did not see it, it was just to fast. it was travelling left to right with a slightly down word slope and the came back from right to left heading back up the valley. you lose sight of it as it pass is the trees. i would have to say it had to be going mock 3 or so. i used to live near an air base so i've seen lots of air craft flying over head and at high speeds. this thing was moving so fast it made the planes look like they where standing still and made no noise at all. i came so close to deleting it off my phone. i would like to say that years before i saw an sr 71 and a f18 fly down the same route at night with a full moon in the back ground boy i wish i had a pic of that it was so cool. i think that it is the south fork of the feather river canyon don't hold me to that.
content.summary: Like a flat top 3 steps down small to large and changed shape, got it on cell video.
